casebody.data:
HOPE
v.
MARION CORRECTIONAL INSTITUTION 195P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Jabar Hope, for Hope, Jabar.

Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of June 2018 by Plaintiff for Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
